name: Nucleus
long_description:
Nucleus is building AI search across sales calls for Product Marketing teams so they can figure out what to build and pitch at the speed of thought. Think of it as Perplexity or ChatGPT over client calls and CRM data. 

Product marketing teams spend hours listening to or doing keyword searches over sales calls to inform go to market strategy. With Nucleus, they can directly pose questions such as “Where are we losing deals and why?”, “What are customers saying about competition?”, “Show me testimonials I can use.” “What features and product bugs are customers reporting?”
one_liner: AI Search Across Sales Calls for Product Marketing teams
